Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Artwork/Prints/Prints on Canvas
Title: Katsushika Hokusai - Red Fuji
Description: 
    Grey Painted Ash Framed Print
  A reproduction of one of the best-known woodblock prints by Japanese artist Katsushika Hokusai (1760-1849). A snow-capped Mount Fuji appears in the background. In line with our timber policy 
   the wood frame is from sustainably managed sources. Born in 1760 
   Edo (modern-day Tokyo) to a family of artisans  Hokusai began painting at the age of six. Despite constant challenges in his career (he changed his name more than 20 times and changed home more than 90 times) 
   Hokusai was incredibly prolific and the variety of works he produced is astonishing (Manga 
   prints  paintings  drawings). Among them  The Big Wave  Red Fuji and The Great Wave off Kanagawa are masterpieces he created in his 70s and which established him as the most celebrated Japanese artist in the History of Art. These woodcut prints 
   also called ukiyo-e or ‘images of the floating world'  are remarkable for their bold composition 
   vivid Prussian blue pigments and arresting depiction of Mount Fuji. Here 
   Hokusai created a new visual grammar comprised of an economy of line and radical composition. For instance 
   in Red Fuji - which refers to the time in autumn when the sun hits the mountain - the artist chose to place Mount Fuji off-centred 
   on the right  in order to introduce a dynamic diagonal line across the print. Similarly 
   in The Great Wave  Hokusai disguised the mount Fuji as a wave 
   thus offering a depiction of landscape infused with life. The obsession that Mount Fuji became for the Japanese artist shaped a new type of practice for him 
   where the same subject was explored from various angles and in different situations (Monet will later follow in Hokusai's footsteps by adopting this approach). These choices reflect Hokusai's creativity and ambition to not only set up 
   but also succeed  an artistic challenge. It is the technical prowess and enduring modernity of the work 
   which fascinated and transformed the work of Impressionist artists such as Monet 
   Degas  and Manet when his work was feted in Paris in the late 1860s. Although dating back to the 18th century 
   the legacy of Hokusai keeps inspiring artists of all eras and all disciplines: from the painting of Van Gogh 
   the architecture of Frank Lloyd Wright  to today's street art and contemporary illustration. - Sustainably sourced ash frame 
 paper  glass 
Price: 125.0

   5.5  4G LTE  SIM Free  256GB  (PRODUCT)RED When you buy the PRODUCT (RED) iPhone 8 Plus 
   a portion of the purchase will go to the Global Fund to support HIV/AIDS programmes and help deliver an AIDS-free generation. The iPhone 8 Plus is more glamorous 
   more powerful and due to iOS 11  even easier for you to use. iPhone 8 Plus merges the future with the present 
   thanks to its 12MP wide-angle and telephoto cameras  A11 Bionic chip featuring 64-bit architecture and extra-intuitive Siri - along with advanced AR and wireless charging capabilities. Beautiful body With its chic new glass and aluminium design 
   the iPhone 8 Plus has been cleverly made with a seven-layer colour process. Providing you with precise hue and opacity 
   as well as delivering a rich depth of colour  your new iPhone 8 Plus has a colour-matched aerospace-grade aluminium bezel. Handily 
   it's also is water and dust resistant  so there's no compromise over style with practicality. Brilliant bionic The A11 Bionic chip is a six-core CPU powerhouse 
   which gives you fantastic performance as well as energy efficiency; you have more power than the iPhone 7 
   yet retain the same great battery life. Extra power means you have access to new machine learning 
   AR apps and immersive 3D games. A11 Bionic incorporates an Apple-designed Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) with a three-core design; delivering you up to 30 percent faster graphics performance than the previous generation. Fantastic photos Thanks to its improved 12-megapixel 
   wide-angle and telephoto cameras and faster sensor  your iPhone 8 Plus is even better at shooting photos and videos. Apple has designed an image signal processor - giving you super pixel processing 
   faster autofocus in low light and better High Dynamic Range (HDR) photos. For improved consistency 
   there's a new quad LED True Tone Flash with Slow Sync  which provides uniformity to the backgrounds and foregrounds of your pictures. Additionally 
   you can shoot 4K video up to 60 frames per second (fps) and 1080p slow motion up to 240fps. Super sounds With redesigned stereo speakers that are up to 25 percent louder than previous iPhone models 
   you now have deeper bass  enabling a richer acoustic experience for your TV shows 
   videos and speakerphone calls. Like the iPhone 7  the iPhone 8 Plus features a Lightning connector for your headphones. If you want to listen through your old headphones 
   the box includes a 3.5mm headphone jack adapter. iOS 11 Wrapped in an easy to use interface 
   iOS 11 opens up amazing Augmented Reality (AR) opportunities in your games and apps 
   makes your photos even more livelier and Siri  Apple's intelligent personal assistant 
   is extra helpful and natural sounding. Thanks to iOS 11  your iPhone is more personal and powerful than ever before. The core collection of apps have been designed with great attention to detail 
   like Photos  Maps  Messages  News and Health - all will work straight out of the box. Additionally 
   with over a million apps available on the easier to use  redesigned App Store 
   you'll find plenty of games or lifestyle aids to assist you. Thanks to iOS 11 and iCloud 
   you can connect your Apple products automatically and make your everyday tasks easier. For example 
   stream videos from your iPhone to your television via your Apple TV 4K; everything's synced 
   so all your devices have the latest information. What is augmented reality? AR can cleverly merge information and digital objects with the environment around you 
   directly onto your phone screen. (If you've ever played or seen Pokémon Go 
   you have experienced AR already.) When looking at your phone screen 
   this ingenious technology enables you to see (for example) handy navigation arrows on a street - aiding you towards a set location 
   or you could view and then shoot virtual aliens as they invade your living room. No matter if an app is AR optimised to assist your lifestyle 
   or for fun-filled gaming  it can provide an amazing experience that can bring the out of this world immersively into this one. What is SIM free? You'll receive the iPhone without having to commit to any network 
   leaving you free to decide which SIM card to use in the device. This gives you the opportunity to find the most suitable plan 
   whether that's contract or pay-as-you-go  throughout the lifetime of the phone. You also have the option to add a foreign SIM card 
   so you can use the iPhone overseas. Click here to learn more about Apple iPhone 8 Plus. Please note: should you need to return your Apple iPhone due to a fault 
   if possible  please help us to protect your information by removing any lock codes and personal data via a factory reset. To remove your lock code: Please click here for assistance. Backup and delete any personal data: Connect your device to a Wi-Fi network. Tap Settings iCloud Backup. Turn on iCloud Backup (if it's not turned on). Make sure you are on a Wi-Fi connection tap Back Up Now. Check your backup by tapping Settings iCloud Storage Manage Storage 
   then please select your device. Disable Find my iPhone: Go to Settings (your name) iCloud (or Settings iCloud) 
   then please turn off Find My (device). Perform a factory reset in Settings: Go to Settings General Reset 
   then select Erase All Content and Settings. WARNING! This will erase all your content. Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified. Correct fitting of all car seats and boosters is of paramount importance to make them most effective in the event of an accident. Not all car seats fit all cars and it is important to check for fitting suitability on all cars you intend fitting the seat to 
   as well as re-checking if you change your car. Always read the instruction booklet which comes with your car seat to achieve a safe and correct fitting 
   retaining the guide for future reference. We recommend fitting your car seat in advance of first using it. We recommend that babies shouldn`t be left in Group 0/0+ car seats (infant carriers) for prolonged periods.   Suitability: Please make sure that you check the car seat you choose is suitable for your car before ordering. Some of our shops offer a car seat fit test 
   where a Nursery advisor will test the display model in your car to check that it will fit properly. Please contact your local shop to see if this service is available. Alternatively 
   please contact the car seat manufacturer who will be able to advise whether their model will be suitable for your car. Find your nearest department store   Car seats are categorised into the following groups and it is imperative that a category is chosen so the child`s weight falls within the range indicated: Car Seat groups: Group Child's weight approx. age of child 0 birth up to 10kg/22lb birth up to 6-9 months 0+ birth up to 13kg/29lb birth up to 12-15 months 0+ & 1 birth up to 18kg/40lb birth to up to about 4 years 1 9-18kg/20-40lb about 9 months to 4 years 1 & 2 9-25kg/20-55lb about 9 months to 6 years 2 15-25kg/33-55lb about 4 to 6 years 1

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: Riedel Veritas Old World Pinot Noir Red Wine Glass
Description: 
    Clear
   705ml Enjoy your favourite wine the way it was meant to taste with this well-crafted lead crystal creation from Riedel. Veritas glasses are 15% taller than Riedel's Vinum collection 
   but 25% lighter  while still remaining dishwasher safe  break-resistant and suitable for everyday use. Designed by Claus Riedel 
   this innovative collection of glassware is manufactured from the finest crystal in Austria and Germany and shaped according to the character of the wine in order to enhance its rich 
   aromatic flavours. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. - Crystal glass 
Price: 27.5

Title:  Mugs & Saucers
Description: 
   Wedgwood Paeonia Blush Tea Cup and Saucer
   200ml Red Designed in vivid colour with an elegant handle  this cup and saucer set is from the Paeonia Blush collection by Wedgwood. It features both metallic and Oriental-style accents and comes gift-boxed 
   making it a highly attractive present. Wedgwood's Paeonia Blush collection celebrates the peony flower with an eclectic mix of gifts and teaware. Derived from the botanical name for the peony 
   the Paeonia collection is designed in the chinoiserie style 
   popularised by the eighteenth and nineteenth-century obsession with the Orient. A historic flower dating back thousands of years 
   the peony is known as the flower of riches and honour. With its luscious and rounded blooms 
   peonies have come to represent romance and prosperity  and are widely regarded as an omen of good fortune and happy marriage. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency & delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Red - Fine bone china 
Price: 55.0

   as well as re-checking if you change your car. Always read the instruction booklet which comes with your car seat to achieve a safe and correct fitting 
   retaining the guide for future reference. We recommend fitting your car seat in advance of first using it. We recommend that babies shouldn`t be left in Group 0/0+ car seats for prolonged periods. Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: Riedel Veritas New World Shiraz Red Wine Glass
Description: 
    Clear
   705ml Enjoy your favourite wine the way it was meant to taste with this well-crafted lead crystal creation from Riedel. This Shiraz glass has a wide waist to aerate the wine and release its full-bodied flavours. Veritas glasses are 15% taller than Riedel's Vinum collection 
   but 25% lighter  while still remaining dishwasher safe  break-resistant and suitable for everyday use. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. Designed by Claus Riedel 
   this innovative collection of glassware is manufactured from the finest crystal in Austria and Germany and shaped according to the character of the wine in order to enhance its rich 
 aromatic tones. - Crystal glass 
Price: 27.5

Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency and delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Red/Blue - Porcelain

   you can experience your games in a comfortable  new and exciting way. Thanks to genuine Dolby 7.1 multi-channel surround sound 
   you're placed right in the middle of the action. You will also experience custom tuned 50mm neodymium speaker drivers 
   that will provide you with exceptional range and accuracy. What good is a headset if your teammates can't hear you properly? The Void Pro Surround Gaming Headset helpfully has a new unidirectional noise cancelling microphone 
   which reduces the amount of ambient noise and aids your voice quality 
   so everyone can listen to your orders - clearly. If you like to fine tune and tweak your settings 
   you're in luck - Corsair's Utility Engine (CUE) software provides you with full control over the headset's features via an intuitive and easy to use interface. Please note: these headphone require the use of a Bluetooth USB receiver (there is no facility for a 3.5mm audio jack). In the box: Void Pro Surround Gaming Headset Dolby Headphone 7.1 PC USB adapter Quick Start Guide Compatibility: PC with USB port Windows 10

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Arts & Crafts/Sewing
Title: Dylon Hand Fabric Dye
Description: 
    50g Red
  Update a dress  renew faded denim or change the colour of your bath towels - with Dylon Dyes refreshing your clothes and accessories has never been easier.   Perfect for both home and fashion projects 
   the Dylon dye is simple to use and produces fantastic results which will remain permanent. This pack contains 50g of dye which is for hand use and dying smaller and delicate pieces that may damage in a washing machine.   To get started weigh your fabric to check you have a sufficient amount of dye 
   then wearing rubber gloves  dissolve dye in 2 pints of warm water. Put 12 pints of hottest tap water in to a flat bottomed bowl or stainless steel sink and add 250g of salt 
   stir well then add dye solution. Put unfolded damp fabric in to the bowl 
   dye for one hour  stirring as instructions advise. To finish rinse in cold water until water runs clear 
   then wash separately in hot water using normal washing detergent.   Please note:  to produce the best and most vibrant results we recommend using Dylon Pre Dye to remove colour from fabric so that is suitable for dyeing to a lighter colour. You will also need to purchase the salt which opens up the pores of fabric enabling it to absorb the dye better. Dylon Dyes are not suitable for use with polyester 
 nylon and synthetic fabrics. - Red 
Price: 2.99

Please note: Register your Maxi-Cosi car seat with them in just three weeks to receive lifetime warranty with them. All our car seats comply with current European regulations ECE R44-03 or ECE R44.04. Safety: Under no circumstances should a car seat be used on a passenger seat where there is an airbag. Correct fitting of all car seats and boosters is of paramount importance to make them most effective in the event of an accident. Not all car seats fit all cars and it is important to check for fitting suitability on all cars you intend fitting the seat to 
   as well as re-checking if you change your car. Always read the instruction booklet which comes with your car seat to achieve a safe and correct fitting 
   retaining the guide for future reference. We recommend fitting your car seat in advance of first using it. We recommend that babies shouldn`t be left in Group 0/0+ car seats for prolonged periods. Suitability: Please make sure that you check the car seat you choose is suitable for your car before ordering. Some of our shops offer a car seat fit test 
   where a Nursery advisor will test the display model in your car to check that it will fit properly. Please contact your local shop to see if this service is available. Alternatively 
   please contact the car seat manufacturer who will be able to advise whether their model will be suitable for your car. href=http://www.johnlewis.com/Shops/DShome.aspx?str=960 class Find your nearest department store Car seat groups: Car seats are categorised into the following groups and it is imperative that a category is chosen so the child`s weight falls within the range indicated: Group Child's weight approx. age of child 0 birth up to 10kg/22lb birth up to 6-9 months 0+ birth up to 13kg/29lb birth up to 12-15 months 0+ & 1 birth up to 18kg/40lb birth to up to about 4 years 1 9-18kg/20-40lb about 9 months to 4 years 1 & 2 9-25kg/20-55lb about 9 months to 6 years 2 15-25kg/33-55lb about 4 to 6 years 1

Title: James Fullarton - Red Sail Natural Ash Framed Print
Description: 
   Choose a fabulous artwork in a size and specification to fit your space. The high-quality image resolution is reproduced on fine art paper or canvas and creates exceptional clarity
   depth and richness of colour that really enlivens your walls. Simply select the desired framing option 
   then the size. You can go for the popular stretched canvas format 
   add a contemporary frame to the stretched canvas  or choose a classic mount and frame for your fine art paper print. Your finished piece will be made to order in the UK to museum standards and delivered within 14 working days. Handmade from solid Ash wood 
   the frame colour choices have been individually curated to complement each artwork. Each frame is finished by hand 
   with a wax coating that protects and shows off the natural grain in the wood. Framing options 
   explained: Stretched Canvas: A canvas print stretched onto a concealed wooden frame Framed Canvas: A stretched canvas print sat in a substantial wooden box frame

   the wood is from sustainable managed sources. All pictures come ready to hang. This is a made to order product 
   printed on museum standard quality paper  and finished in a handmade frame. We always recommend checking your wall space to ensure you're happy with your measurements.    the frame colour choices have been individually curated to complement each artwork. Each frame is finished by hand

   this bagless vacuum cleaner achieves first-class cleaning performance 
   making sure any coarse soiling and fine dust are separated and deposited in the dedicated 
   transparent container. Thermal protection All Miele vacuums are prevented from overheating thanks to a smart temperature limiter. In case the air passage becomes blocked 
   the motor will automatically shut off for added safety. Once the cause has been removed and the appliance has cooled down 
   your CX1 will be ready to use again. ComfortClean For consistently high cleaning performance 
   special sensors measure the air that travels through the fine dust filter and automatically activate the ComfortClean self-cleaning function as needed. The appliance automatically switches off for about 20 seconds 
   or alternatively  ComfortClean can be activated manually. Click2open With one simple motion 
   the dust container can be removed by pulling it upwards  leaving the dust to be emptied out of the bottom and straight into the bin. This method of emptying is particularly hygienic as no direct contact is made with the dust 
   and the container empties completely. Large operating radius The cable 
   suction tube and hose of the CX1 combine to offer an extra large operating radius

Category: Baby Products/Car Seats & Accessories/Car Seats
Title: Joie Every Stage Group 0+/1/2/3 Car Seat
Description: 
    Red
  The Every Stage car seat from Joie is suitable from birth to 12 years and adjusts accordingly as your child grows.   It grows up and out together 
   so the AutoAdjustTM side wings widen as the headrest is adjusted for a custom fit and maximum protection through every stage of your child's life. The Grow Together multi-height headrest and harness system also adjust simultaneously and require no re-threading of the harness. It also features custom Harness Hideaway compartments that store the 5-point harness when it is being used as a Group 2 booster seat.   The Every Stage car seat protects your baby from birth-18kg as a rearward facing group 0+ car seat 
   and forward facing from 9kg-36kg as a group 1  2 and 3 car seat.   It features side impact protection with multi position Guard Surround SafetyTM panels which provide extra side protection and fold into the seat when not in use.   Other features include:   One-hand 
   10 position height adjustable headrest AutoAdjustTM side wings widen as headrest is raised Reinforced steel inner seat shell Plush deluxe cushioning and fabrics Built in side ventilation Side mesh storage pockets Safety: Under no circumstances should a car seat be used on a passenger seat where there is an airbag. Correct fitting of all car seats and boosters is of paramount importance to make them most effective in the event of an accident. Not all car seats fit all cars and it is important to check for fitting suitability on all cars you intend fitting the seat to 
   as well as re-checking if you change your car. Always read the instruction booklet which comes with your car seat to achieve a safe and correct fitting 
   retaining the guide for future reference. We recommend fitting your car seat in advance of first using it. We recommend that babies shouldn`t be left in Group 0/0+ car seats (infant carriers) for prolonged periods.   Suitability: Please make sure that you check the car seat you choose is suitable for your car before ordering. Some of our shops offer a car seat fit test 
   where a Nursery advisor will test the display model in your car to check that it will fit properly. Please contact your local shop to see if this service is available. Alternatively 
   please contact the car seat manufacturer who will be able to advise whether their model will be suitable for your car. Find your nearest department store   Car seats are categorised into the following groups and it is imperative that a category is chosen so the child`s weight falls within the range indicated: Car Seat groups: Group Child's weight approx. age of child 0 birth up to 10kg/22lb birth up to 6-9 months 0+ birth up to 13kg/29lb birth up to 12-15 months 0+ & 1 birth up to 18kg/40lb birth to up to about 4 years 1 9-18kg/20-40lb about 9 months to 4 years 1 & 2 9-25kg/20-55lb about 9 months to 6 years 2 15-25kg/33-55lb about 4 to 6 years 1 
   2  3 9-36kg/20-79lb about 9 months to 12 years 2 & 3 15-36kg/33-79lb about 4-12 years Note: some car seats will be approved in two or more groups. 0% APR Representative: this product is eligible for Interest Free Credit 
   available when you spend £1000 or more on selected Nursery products. Call 01698545112 
   or visit our shops. Terms and conditions apply: find out more - Unisex

Title: Vitra Allstar Office Chair Red
Description: 
   Designed by Konstantin Grcic
   the Vitra Allstar defies the typical office stereotype. Allstar expresses a sense of familiarity and casualness which make it suited for a wide variety of settings 
   both professional and domestic.   Allstar contains the necessary functional features of an office chair: a synchronised mechanism with lockable positioning 
   seat depth and height adjustment  and an adjustable backrest.   A robust plastic loop frame acts as armrests and backrest support 
   enabling the separate movement of the seat and backrest. The curved shape of the cushions of the seat and back ensure a high level of comfort.   Thanks to its form and technical function 
   Allstar is suited to a wide variety of settings - an ideal choice for the modern workplace 
   co-working spaces as well as home offices.   Konstantin Grcic trained as a cabinetmaker at Parnham College in Dorset before studying industrial design at the Royal College of Art in London. In 1991 he set up his own Munich-based practice

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: LSA International Wine Culture Red Wine Balloon Glasses
Description: 
    590ml
   Set of 2 The Wine Culture collection is for the connoisseur who loves the clean lines of contemporary design. Handmade from the highest quality materials 
   this glass has an elegant simple silhouette  a fine rim and tall stems. The LSA International logo is sandblasted into the foot of each glass. The pair is presented in premium packaging reflecting the quality of the products. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. - Soda Lime Glass 
Price: 50.0

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Home Accessories/Window Treatments/Blinds/Vertical Blinds
Title: Romo Tulipa Roller Blind
Description: 
    Spring Mechanism Red Coral
  This blind can be custom made to fit your window. Simply measure your window and order the next size up closest to your measurements. We will contact you by phone within one working day and your blind will be completed within 7 days after that. To measure up for blinds: Use a metal tape measure and make a note of your measurements to the nearest millimetre. For a blind inside a window recess: Make sure the recess your blind is going into is not obstructed in any way 
   so that the blind can hang freely when pulled down. Measure the total width and length from C to D (see image 5 above). As shown 
   do this in several places to allow for any slight variation for irregularity in your windows 
   then make a note of the narrowest measurement. For a blind outside a window recess: Decide how far you want the fabric to overlap at each side. Measure the installation height (see image 5). This will be from the height at which you intend to fit the headrail to the floor. Size restrictions: Minimum width 41cm. 0% APR Representative: this product is eligible for Interest Free Credit 
   available when you spend £1000 or more on selected home products. Call 03456 065019 
   or visit our shops. Terms and conditions apply: find out more - Red Coral - 100% cotton - Max W90 x Max Drop 160cm

Title: Claire Brooker - Red Poppy Natural Ash Framed Print
Description: 
   Choose a fabulous artwork in a size and specification to fit your space. The high-quality image resolution is reproduced on fine art paper or canvas and creates exceptional clarity
   depth and richness of colour that really enlivens your walls. Simply select the desired framing option 
   then the size. You can go for the popular stretched canvas format 
   add a contemporary frame to the stretched canvas  or choose a classic mount and frame for your fine art paper print. Your finished piece will be made to order in the UK to museum standards and delivered within 14 working days. Handmade from solid Ash wood 
   the frame colour choices have been individually curated to complement each artwork. Each frame is finished by hand 
   with a wax coating that protects and shows off the natural grain in the wood. Framing options 
   explained: Stretched Canvas: A canvas print stretched onto a concealed wooden frame Framed Canvas: A stretched canvas print sat in a substantial wooden box frame 
   giving a contemporary art gallery feel Framed Print: A fine art paper print presented in a high-quality white mount and hand-finished wooden frame. The print is glazed with acrylic for safety All paper and canvas prints are produced using the giclée method. In line with our timber policy 
   the wood is from sustainable managed sources. All pictures come ready to hang. This is a made to order product 
   printed on museum standard quality paper  and finished in a handmade frame. We always recommend checking your wall space to ensure you're happy with your measurements. Category: Large Appliances/Dishwashers/Full Size Dishwashers
Title: Smeg DF6FABRD Retro Freestanding Dishwasher
Description: 
    Red
  The DF6FABRD is a 1950s inspired dishwasher with an abundance of modern features 
   making a design statement in your kitchen. Its large capacity boasts enough room for 13 place settings handling the dishwashing needs of a large household 
   or when you fancy hosting a dinner party. This model has a maximum noise level of just 43dB - so you can get on with your day while it quietly manages the washing up. A choice of 13 programmes allows you to wash according to your needs 
   and as it only uses just under 10 litres of water per standard cycle 
   you can be sure that your dishes are being washed efficiently and your dishwasher is environmentally friendly. Quick wash An impressive 27 minute fast wash from the daily quick programme is fast 
   but incredibly powerful  suitable for a lightly soiled load. Orbital wash system Ensures precise water distribution to maintain excellent efficiency 
   so you don't waste water or energy  and you may even save on the pounds. FlexiDuo baskets Includes two separate and moveable sections that can be adjusted to best suit your dishwashing needs 
   accommodating small cups  ladles and bulky utensils. There is also a colour coordinated cutlery basket and internal trimming 
   with blue interior lighting. Delay timer Take advantage of off-peak energy costs and set a start time of up to 9 hours for your load to begin - this could also come in handy if you want a wash to finish just as you get home from work. Crystal cycle is particularly designed for delicate dishes with light dirt. A 'fast & strong' programme takes less than an hour to eliminate stubborn dirt and dried on residues. The half load option saves energy and water 
   and a 70 degree super programme is ideal for stubborn dirt. Please note: This product is slightly taller than standard worktops and as such cannot be built-in or slotted beneath a worktop. Additionally 
   a gap of 100mm must be left on the left-hand side of the product to allow the door to open.

   and as it only uses just under 10 litres of water per standard cycle 
   you can be sure that your dishes are being washed efficiently and your dishwasher is environmentally friendly. Quick wash An impressive 27 minute fast wash from the daily quick programme is fast 
   but incredibly powerful  suitable for a lightly soiled load. Orbital wash system Ensures precise water distribution to maintain excellent efficiency 
   so you don't waste water or energy  and you may even save on the pounds. FlexiDuo baskets Includes two separate and moveable sections that can be adjusted to best suit your dishwashing needs 
   accommodating small cups  ladles and bulky utensils. There is also a colour coordinated cutlery basket and internal trimming 
   with blue interior lighting. Delay timer Take advantage of off-peak energy costs and set a start time of up to 9 hours for your load to begin - this could also come in handy if you want a wash to finish just as you get home from work. Programmes Crystal cycle is particularly designed for delicate dishes with light dirt. A 'fast & strong' programme takes less than an hour to eliminate stubborn dirt and dried on residues. The half load option saves energy and water 
   and a 70 degree super programme is ideal for stubborn dirt. 
Price: 899.0

   the Scout RX1 is able to negotiate height differences of up to 2cm making it ideal for rooms with rugs . Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Aluminium Oval House Sign
Description: 
    Wild Rose Motif
   Large Red Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. These stylish  polished aluminium house signs are a favourite of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished aluminium by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Category: Baby Products/Car Seats & Accessories/Car Seats
Title: BeSafe iZi Modular i-Size Car Seat
Description: 
    Red
  The BeSafe iZi Modular car seat is an ergonomically-designed car seat that's suitable for children aged from 6 months to 4 years old. A double-cushion insert lets the seat grow with your child.   The Besafe iZi Modular is extremely tough thanks to its complete EPS/polystyrene inner shell and extra side impact protection (i-Size regulation-approved). You can also place either side of the seat that's next to the car door the unique ‘SIP+' shock absorber for extra peace of mind.   The luxury melange textured fabric gives your child lots of padding 
   while the covers can easily be removed and cleaned in a washing machine. For additional comfort there are multiple reclining positions 
   while the headrest has 4 positions.   The BeSafe iZi Modular car seat is front or rear facing with a 5-belt harness 
   while magnets also keep the internal harness out of the way 
   for easy access.   For use with the BeSafe iZi Modular i-Size base (sold separately).   All our car seats and infant carriers comply with current European regulations ECE R44.04.   Safety: Under no circumstances should a car seat be used on a passenger seat where there is an airbag. Correct fitting of all car seats and boosters is of paramount importance to make them most effective in the event of an accident. Not all car seats fit all cars and it is important to check for fitting suitability on all cars you intend fitting the seat to 
   as well as re-checking if you change your car. Always read the instruction booklet which comes with your car seat to achieve a safe and correct fitting 
   retaining the guide for future reference. We recommend fitting your car seat in advance of first using it. We recommend that babies shouldn`t be left in Group 0/0+ car seats (infant carriers) for prolonged periods.   Suitability: Please make sure that you check the car seat you choose is suitable for your car before ordering. Some of our shops offer a car seat fit test 
   where a Nursery advisor will test the display model in your car to check that it will fit properly. Please contact your local shop to see if this service is available. Alternatively 
   please contact the car seat manufacturer who will be able to advise whether their model will be suitable for your car. Find your nearest department store   Car seats are categorised into the following groups and it is imperative that a category is chosen so the child`s weight falls within the range indicated: Car Seat groups: Group Child's weight approx. age of child 0 birth up to 10kg/22lb birth up to 6-9 months 0+ birth up to 13kg/29lb birth up to 12-15 months 0+ & 1 birth up to 18kg/40lb birth to up to about 4 years 1 9-18kg/20-40lb about 9 months to 4 years 1 & 2 9-25kg/20-55lb about 9 months to 6 years 2 15-25kg/33-55lb about 4 to 6 years 1 
   2  3 9-36kg/20-79lb about 9 months to 12 years 2 & 3 15-36kg/33-79lb about 4-12 years Note: some car seats will be approved in two or more groups. 0% APR Representative: this product is eligible for Interest Free Credit 
   available when you spend £1000 or more on selected Nursery products. Call 01698545112 
   or visit our shops. Terms and conditions apply: find out more - Unisex

Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Solid Brass Oval House Sign
Description: 
    Wild Rose Motif Red
  Brass signs are the pride of the collection  with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished brass by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Category: Sports & Outdoors/Sports & Outdoor Clothing/Men
Title: Red Letter Days Microlight Flying
Description: 
   Flying a microlight is an exhilarating experience
   and one which needs strong nerves and a real head for heights! Begin with a short briefing from a qualified instructor 
   before hopping into a microlight  which there are two types of 
   both dual-controlled. The 'flex wing' is based on the frame of a hang glider; or 'fixed wing' 
   which is similar to a conventional light aircraft. Once airborne 
   experience the incredible speed and manoeuvrability of these little craft 
   with the instructor on hand to offer guidance and encouragement to participants to take over the controls and assume the role of honorary pilot. This flight time can also count towards a microlight Private Pilot's Licence.

Description: 
    Daffodil Motif Red
  Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. Brass signs are the pride of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished brass by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. Category: Home & Garden/Garden & Outdoors/Garden Décor/House Numbers & Signs
Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Solid Brass Oval House Sign
Description: 
    Rose Motif Red
  Brass signs are the pride of the collection  with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished brass by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 4 weeks of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Please note: This house sign is not suitable for use in coastal areas. Made to order product This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more . - Red

    iOS 11
   5.5  4G LTE  SIM Free  64GB  (PRODUCT)RED When you buy the PRODUCT (RED) iPhone 8 Plus 
   a portion of the purchase will go to the Global Fund to support HIV/AIDS programmes and help deliver an AIDS-free generation. The iPhone 8 Plus is more glamorous 
   more powerful and due to iOS 11  even easier for you to use. iPhone 8 Plus merges the future with the present 
   thanks to its 12MP wide-angle and telephoto cameras  A11 Bionic chip featuring 64-bit architecture and extra-intuitive Siri - along with advanced AR and wireless charging capabilities. Beautiful body With its chic new glass and aluminium design 
   the iPhone 8 Plus has been cleverly made with a seven-layer colour process. Providing you with precise hue and opacity 
   as well as delivering a rich depth of colour  your new iPhone 8 Plus has a colour-matched aerospace-grade aluminium bezel. Handily 
   it's also is water and dust resistant  so there's no compromise over style with practicality. Brilliant bionic The A11 Bionic chip is a six-core CPU powerhouse 
   which gives you fantastic performance as well as energy efficiency; you have more power than the iPhone 7 
   yet retain the same great battery life. Extra power means you have access to new machine learning 
   AR apps and immersive 3D games. A11 Bionic incorporates an Apple-designed Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) with a three-core design; delivering you up to 30 percent faster graphics performance than the previous generation. Fantastic photos Thanks to its improved 12-megapixel 
   wide-angle and telephoto cameras and faster sensor  your iPhone 8 Plus is even better at shooting photos and videos. Apple has designed an image signal processor - giving you super pixel processing 
   faster autofocus in low light and better High Dynamic Range (HDR) photos. For improved consistency 
   there's a new quad LED True Tone Flash with Slow Sync  which provides uniformity to the backgrounds and foregrounds of your pictures. Additionally 
   you can shoot 4K video up to 60 frames per second (fps) and 1080p slow motion up to 240fps. Super sounds With redesigned stereo speakers that are up to 25 percent louder than previous iPhone models 
   you now have deeper bass  enabling a richer acoustic experience for your TV shows 
   videos and speakerphone calls. Like the iPhone 7  the iPhone 8 Plus features a Lightning connector for your headphones. If you want to listen through your old headphones 
   the box includes a 3.5mm headphone jack adapter. iOS 11 Wrapped in an easy to use interface 
   iOS 11 opens up amazing Augmented Reality (AR) opportunities in your games and apps 
   makes your photos even more livelier and Siri  Apple's intelligent personal assistant 
   is extra helpful and natural sounding. Thanks to iOS 11  your iPhone is more personal and powerful than ever before. The core collection of apps have been designed with great attention to detail 
   like Photos  Maps  Messages  News and Health - all will work straight out of the box. Additionally 
   with over a million apps available on the easier to use  redesigned App Store 
   you'll find plenty of games or lifestyle aids to assist you. Thanks to iOS 11 and iCloud 
   you can connect your Apple products automatically and make your everyday tasks easier. For example 
   stream videos from your iPhone to your television via your Apple TV 4K; everything's synced 
   so all your devices have the latest information. What is augmented reality? AR can cleverly merge information and digital objects with the environment around you 
   directly onto your phone screen. (If you've ever played or seen Pokémon Go 
   you have experienced AR already.) When looking at your phone screen 
   this ingenious technology enables you to see (for example) handy navigation arrows on a street - aiding you towards a set location 
   or you could view and then shoot virtual aliens as they invade your living room. No matter if an app is AR optimised to assist your lifestyle 
   or for fun-filled gaming  it can provide an amazing experience that can bring the out of this world immersively into this one. What is SIM free? You'll receive the iPhone without having to commit to any network 
   leaving you free to decide which SIM card to use in the device. This gives you the opportunity to find the most suitable plan 
   whether that's contract or pay-as-you-go  throughout the lifetime of the phone. You also have the option to add a foreign SIM card 
   so you can use the iPhone overseas. Click here to learn more about Apple iPhone 8 Plus. Please note: should you need to return your Apple iPhone due to a fault 
   if possible  please help us to protect your information by removing any lock codes and personal data via a factory reset. To remove your lock code: Please click here for assistance. Backup and delete any personal data: Connect your device to a Wi-Fi network. Tap Settings iCloud Backup. Turn on iCloud Backup (if it's not turned on). Make sure you are on a Wi-Fi connection tap Back Up Now. Check your backup by tapping Settings iCloud Storage Manage Storage 
   then please select your device. Disable Find my iPhone: Go to Settings (your name) iCloud (or Settings iCloud) 
   then please turn off Find My (device). Perform a factory reset in Settings: Go to Settings General Reset 
   then select Erase All Content and Settings. WARNING! This will erase all your content. Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.    you can use your mobile phone  tablet or any other Bluetooth enabled device to take full control of the speaker across a 45 metre range. Pair it with up to eight Bluetooth devices for a choice of playlists. Magic Button Play 
   pause and skip songs with just one touch  directly on the speaker. Adventure-proof MEGABOOM 3 is IP67-rated waterproof which means that it can be immersed up to 1 metre for up to 30 minutes 
   and it floats. It's also dustproof and shockproof. Megaboom Battery It lasts for up to 20 hours and is recharged with the included USB cable. Or grab an Ultimate Ears Power-up dock and make sure you're always full charged (sold separately). Category: Large Appliances/Ovens & Hobs/Range Ovens/Freestanding Ranges
Title: Britannia RC-10TI-DE Delphi Induction Hob Range Cooker Red
Description: 
   Ultra modern in appearance
   the Britannia Delphi range cooker boasts professional features to help you master the art of cooking. With a meat probe 
   heavy-duty shelves and telescopic runners as standard  the Delphi is Brittania's flagship model and will quickly become the heart of your home. The induction hob features 5 zones with hot hob indicators 
   and is an effortless form of heating for hob cooking. Induction heating gives near-instant heat (comparable to gas) and allows you to precisely control the temperature at which you cook. As only the area at the base of the pan is heated 
   it's also highly efficient. Below the hob are two electric ovens with triple-glazed see-through doors 
   internal lights and integral electric grills. Both also have removable oven door 
   inner glass panels and oven stay-clean roof liners  for easy cleaning. They're also A-rated for energy. The fully programmable left oven has a Quickstart fast pre-heat system plus 9 programmes for all your cooking needs. The smaller oven includes a rotisserie for spit roasting. A soft close storage drawer and a fully automatic programmer and minute minder top off this model. Please note: If you have a heart pacemaker 
   do seek advice from your doctor before using an induction hob. Please also only use pans suitable for induction hobs. These include enamelled steel 
   iron  stainless steel (depending on the alloy) and some aluminium pans with a ferromagnetic base. Glass and copper bases are unsuitable. - Red 
Price: 3399.0

   ensuring the majority of household stains can be easily removed using just water and a cloth. This chair is part of a collection that can be customised in shops. Our customised chair collection consists of five chair shapes with a choice of three leg finishes and over fifty fabric options 
   including leathers and innovative Aquaclean fabrics. Each chair is hand made to order in Italy and arrives fully assembled. Ask in our shops for more details. Please note: not all our ranges are on display in our shops. For more information

Category: Home & Garden/Garden & Outdoors/Garden Décor/House Numbers & Signs
Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Polished Aluminium Bridge House Sign
Description: 
    Flower Scroll Motif
   Medium Red Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. These stylish  polished aluminium house signs are a favourite of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the black background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished aluminium by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 4 weeks of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Please note: This house sign is not suitable for use in coastal areas. Made to order product This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more . This does not affect your statutory rights. - Red 
Price: 165.0

   380ml Red A Tokyo Design Studio mug with intricate patterns inspired by traditional Japanse designs and given a contemporary twist. Made from durable porcelain 
   this mug is dishwasher and microwave safe. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency and delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Red - Porcelain 
Price: 10.0

Category: Large Appliances/Ovens & Hobs/Range Ovens/Freestanding Ranges
Title: Rangemaster Elise 110 Induction Hob Range Cooker Cherry Red
Description: 
   The ultimate range for cooking up delicious cuisine
   the quintessential Elise is inspired by generations of gourmet excellence. Inspired by the passion and panache that ensures European chefs are revered worldwide 
   the Elise range cooker will awaken your inner gastronome. One glance at this chic range cooker is all it takes to identify its distinctly continental design direction. From the stylish controls 
   to the coordinating brushed chrome trim that lends front profile definition 
   a continental flair for sophisticated design is evident throughout. The induction hob features 6 zones with hot hob indicators. Induction is an effortless form of heating for hob cooking. Induction heating gives near-instant heat (comparable to gas) and allows you to precisely control the temperature at which you cook. As only the area at the base of the pan is heated 
   it's also highly efficient. There's 1 multifunction oven and 1 fan oven. The main oven offers 7 different settings including defrost and base heat. There's also Rangemaster's innovative Handyrack which makes it incredibly easy to access any roasting trays. The separate grill features a glide-out action to make tending to your dish easier and more secure. The cooker is also height adjustable and has catalytic stay-clean liners. A handy storage drawer is on the bottom right hand side 
   perfect for keeping utensils or crockery warm. Please note: If you have a heart pacemaker 
   do seek advice from your doctor before using an induction hob. Please also only use pans suitable for induction hobs. These include enamelled steel 
   iron  stainless steel (depending on the alloy) and some aluminium pans with a ferromagnetic base. Glass and copper bases are unsuitable. Rangemaster's original range cooker 
   made in 1830  was a revelation to the cooking fraternity. They are still manufactured in Royal Leamington Spa 
   Warwickshire  benefiting from over 200 years of manufacturing excellence. Great cooking has always started with a great cooker and the new ranges still share the original dedication to quality 
 design and innovation. - Cherry Red 
Price: 2709.0

   the Eames Plastic Chairs are even better suited for use in combination with contemporary dining tables. At home as well as in restaurants and cafeterias 
   the many configuration options make it possible to find just the right chair for any furnishing scheme or interior environment. Husband and wife team Charles and Ray Eames revolutionised 20th Century furniture design. They combined their respective disciplines in architecture and modern art with low-cost yet durable materials to create perfectly balanced 
   functional furniture. The Eames' works have proved to be real ‘designs for life': they're iconic art pieces and objects of desire 
   yet utterly practical. Originally made in fibreglass for the 1950 MOMA Low Cost Furniture design competition 
   the DSR was the first industrially-produced plastic chair. Please note: not all our ranges are on display in our shops. For more information 
   please speak to a furniture Partner in store  or call 03452 661805 and we can tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display. - Red - Polypropylene

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Arts & Crafts/Sewing
Title: Dylon Hand Fabric Dye
Description: 
    50g Rosewood Red
  Update a dress  renew faded denim or change the colour of your bath towels - with Dylon Dyes refreshing your clothes and accessories has never been easier.   Perfect for both home and fashion projects 
   the Dylon dye is simple to use and produces fantastic results which will remain permanent. This pack contains 50g of dye which is for hand use and dying smaller and delicate pieces that may damage in a washing machine.   To get started weigh your fabric to check you have a sufficient amount of dye 
   then wearing rubber gloves  dissolve dye in 2 pints of warm water. Put 12 pints of hottest tap water in to a flat bottomed bowl or stainless steel sink and add 250g of salt 
   stir well then add dye solution. Put unfolded damp fabric in to the bowl 
   dye for one hour  stirring as instructions advise. To finish rinse in cold water until water runs clear 
   then wash separately in hot water using normal washing detergent.   Please note:  to produce the best and most vibrant results we recommend using Dylon Pre Dye to remove colour from fabric so that is suitable for dyeing to a lighter colour. You will also need to purchase the salt which opens up the pores of fabric enabling it to absorb the dye better. Dylon Dyes are not suitable for use with polyester 
 nylon and synthetic fabrics. - Rosewood Red 
Price: 2.99

Title: Apple iPhone 8

    iOS 11
   4.7  4G LTE  SIM Free  64GB  (PRODUCT)RED When you buy the PRODUCT (RED) iPhone 8 
   a portion of the purchase will go to the Global Fund to support HIV/AIDS programmes and help deliver an AIDS-free generation. The iPhone 8 is more glamorous 
   more powerful and due to iOS 11  even easier for you to use. iPhone 8 merges the future with the present 
   thanks to its A11 Bionic chip with 64-bit architecture and extra-intuitive Siri - along with advanced AR and wireless charging capabilities. Beautiful body With its chic new glass and aluminium design 
   the iPhone 8 has been constructed with some of the most durable glass ever to feature in a smartphone - it's been cleverly made with a seven-layer colour process. Providing you with precise hue and opacity 
   as well as delivering a rich depth of colour  your new iPhone 8 has a colour-matched aerospace-grade aluminium bezel. Handily 
   it's also is water and dust resistant  so there's no compromise over style with practicality. Brilliant bionic The A11 Bionic chip is a six-core CPU powerhouse 
   which gives you fantastic performance as well as energy efficiency; you have more power than the iPhone 7 
   yet retain the same great battery life. Extra power means you have access to new machine learning 
   AR apps and immersive 3D games. A11 Bionic incorporates an Apple-designed Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) with a three-core design; delivering you up to 30 percent faster graphics performance than the previous generation. Fantastic photos Thanks to its improved 12-megapixel camera and faster sensor 
   your iPhone 8 is even better at shooting photos and videos. Apple has designed an image signal processor - giving you super pixel processing 
   faster autofocus in low light and better High Dynamic Range (HDR) photos. For improved consistency 
   there's a new quad LED True Tone Flash with Slow Sync  which provides uniformity to the backgrounds and foregrounds of your pictures. Additionally 
   you can shoot 4K video up to 60 frames per second (fps) and 1080p slow motion up to 240fps. Super sounds With redesigned stereo speakers that are up to 25 percent louder than previous iPhone models 
   you now have deeper bass  enabling a richer acoustic experience for your TV shows 
   videos and speakerphone calls. Like the iPhone 7  the iPhone 8 features a Lightning connector for your headphones. If you want to listen through your old headphones 
   the box includes a 3.5mm headphone jack adapter. iOS 11 Wrapped in an easy to use interface 
   iOS 11 opens up amazing augmented reality (AR) opportunities in your games and apps 
   makes your photos even more livelier and Siri  Apple's intelligent personal assistant 
   is extra helpful and natural sounding. Thanks to iOS 11  your iPhone is more personal and powerful than ever before. The core collection of apps have been designed with great attention to detail 
   like Photos  Maps  Messages  News and Health - all will work straight out of the box. Additionally 
   with over a million apps available on the easier to use  redesigned App Store 
   you'll find plenty of games or lifestyle aids to assist you. Thanks to iOS 11 and iCloud 
   you can connect your Apple products automatically and make your everyday tasks easier. For example 
   stream videos from your iPhone to your television via your Apple TV 4K; everything's synced 
   so all your devices have the latest information. What is augmented reality? AR can cleverly merge information and digital objects with the environment around you 
   directly onto your phone screen. (If you've ever played or seen Pokémon Go 
   you have experienced AR already.) When looking at your phone screen 
   this ingenious technology enables you to see (for example) handy navigation arrows on a street - aiding you towards a set location 
   or you could view and then shoot virtual aliens as they invade your living room. No matter if an app is AR optimised to assist your lifestyle 
   or for fun-filled gaming  it can provide an amazing experience that can bring the out of this world immersively into this one. What is SIM free? You'll receive the iPhone without having to commit to any network 
   leaving you free to decide which SIM card to use in the device. This gives you the opportunity to find the most suitable plan 
   whether that's contract or pay-as-you-go  throughout the lifetime of the phone. You also have the option to add a foreign SIM card 
   so you can use the iPhone overseas. Click here to learn more about Apple iPhone 8. Please note: should you need to return your Apple iPhone due to a fault 
   if possible  please help us to protect your information by removing any lock codes and personal data via a factory reset. To remove your lock code: Please click here for assistance. Backup and delete any personal data: Connect your device to a Wi-Fi network. Tap Settings iCloud Backup. Turn on iCloud Backup (if it's not turned on). Make sure you are on a Wi-Fi connection tap Back Up Now. Check your backup by tapping Settings iCloud Storage Manage Storage 
   then please select your device. Disable Find my iPhone: Go to Settings (your name) iCloud (or Settings iCloud) 
   then please turn off Find My (device). Perform a factory reset in Settings: Go to Settings General Reset 
   then select Erase All Content and Settings. WARNING! This will erase all your content. Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.
