Category: Electronics & Photo/Mobile Phones & Communication/Mobile Phones & Smartphones/SIM-Free Mobile Phones & Smartphones
Title: Apple iPhone 8
Description: 
    iOS 11
   4.7  4G LTE  SIM Free  256GB  (PRODUCT)RED When you buy the PRODUCT (RED) iPhone 8 
   a portion of the purchase will go to the Global Fund to support HIV/AIDS programmes and help deliver an AIDS-free generation. The iPhone 8 is more glamorous 
   more powerful and due to iOS 11  even easier for you to use. iPhone 8 merges the future with the present 
   thanks to its A11 Bionic chip with 64-bit architecture and extra-intuitive Siri - along with advanced AR and wireless charging capabilities. Beautiful body With its chic new glass and aluminium design 
   the iPhone 8 has been constructed with some of the most durable glass ever to feature in a smartphone - it's been cleverly made with a seven-layer colour process. Providing you with precise hue and opacity 
   as well as delivering a rich depth of colour  your new iPhone 8 has a colour-matched aerospace-grade aluminium bezel. Handily 
   it's also is water and dust resistant  so there's no compromise over style with practicality. Brilliant bionic The A11 Bionic chip is a six-core CPU powerhouse 
   which gives you fantastic performance as well as energy efficiency; you have more power than the iPhone 7 
   yet retain the same great battery life. Extra power means you have access to new machine learning 
   AR apps and immersive 3D games. A11 Bionic incorporates an Apple-designed Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) with a three-core design; delivering you up to 30 percent faster graphics performance than the previous generation. Fantastic photos Thanks to its improved 12-megapixel camera and faster sensor 
   your iPhone 8 is even better at shooting photos and videos. Apple has designed an image signal processor - giving you super pixel processing 
   faster autofocus in low light and better High Dynamic Range (HDR) photos. For improved consistency 
   there's a new quad LED True Tone Flash with Slow Sync  which provides uniformity to the backgrounds and foregrounds of your pictures. Additionally 
   you can shoot 4K video up to 60 frames per second (fps) and 1080p slow motion up to 240fps. Super sounds With redesigned stereo speakers that are up to 25 percent louder than previous iPhone models 
   you now have deeper bass  enabling a richer acoustic experience for your TV shows 
   videos and speakerphone calls. Like the iPhone 7  the iPhone 8 features a Lightning connector for your headphones. If you want to listen through your old headphones 
   the box includes a 3.5mm headphone jack adapter. iOS 11 Wrapped in an easy to use interface 
   iOS 11 opens up amazing augmented reality (AR) opportunities in your games and apps 
   makes your photos even more livelier and Siri  Apple's intelligent personal assistant 
   is extra helpful and natural sounding. Thanks to iOS 11  your iPhone is more personal and powerful than ever before. The core collection of apps have been designed with great attention to detail 
   like Photos  Maps  Messages  News and Health - all will work straight out of the box. Additionally 
   with over a million apps available on the easier to use  redesigned App Store 
   you'll find plenty of games or lifestyle aids to assist you. Thanks to iOS 11 and iCloud 
   you can connect your Apple products automatically and make your everyday tasks easier. For example 
   stream videos from your iPhone to your television via your Apple TV 4K; everything's synced 
   so all your devices have the latest information. What is augmented reality? AR can cleverly merge information and digital objects with the environment around you 
   directly onto your phone screen. (If you've ever played or seen Pokémon Go 
   you have experienced AR already.) When looking at your phone screen 
   this ingenious technology enables you to see (for example) handy navigation arrows on a street - aiding you towards a set location 
   or you could view and then shoot virtual aliens as they invade your living room. No matter if an app is AR optimised to assist your lifestyle 
   or for fun-filled gaming  it can provide an amazing experience that can bring the out of this world immersively into this one. What is SIM free? You'll receive the iPhone without having to commit to any network 
   leaving you free to decide which SIM card to use in the device. This gives you the opportunity to find the most suitable plan 
   whether that's contract or pay-as-you-go  throughout the lifetime of the phone. You also have the option to add a foreign SIM card 
   so you can use the iPhone overseas. Click here to learn more about Apple iPhone 8. Please note: should you need to return your Apple iPhone due to a fault 
   if possible  please help us to protect your information by removing any lock codes and personal data via a factory reset. To remove your lock code: Please click here for assistance. Backup and delete any personal data: Connect your device to a Wi-Fi network. Tap Settings iCloud Backup. Turn on iCloud Backup (if it's not turned on). Make sure you are on a Wi-Fi connection tap Back Up Now. Check your backup by tapping Settings iCloud Storage Manage Storage 
   then please select your device. Disable Find my iPhone: Go to Settings (your name) iCloud (or Settings iCloud) 
   then please turn off Find My (device). Perform a factory reset in Settings: Go to Settings General Reset 
   then select Erase All Content and Settings. WARNING! This will erase all your content. Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified. Looking for a case? Take care of your new mobile with one of our cases. Please click here to browse the range. Thought about Added Care? No one ever means to drop their prized device - regrettably 
   we've all done it. Please click here to see if Added Care could provide you with extra peace of mind when using your technology.

   professional build quality and outstanding cooking performance that are synonymous with the Falcon name. The induction hob has 5 zones for the ultimate in controlled cooking 
   all with a boost feature for super-fast boiling. Induction heating gives near-instant heat (comparable to gas) and allows you to precisely control the temperature at which you cook. As only the area at the base of the pan is heated 
   it's also highly efficient. This hob also features pan detection and boil dry detection for added peace of mind. Beneath is a full-width storage drawer and 2 side-by-side ovens - one fan 
   one multifunction with programmable timer. The functions of the versatile left-hand oven are: Defrost Conventional Fan grilling Fan-assisted oven Fan oven Browning element Base heat Both ovens have enamel liners. Category: Electronics & Photo/Hi-Fi & Home Audio/Speakers/Speaker Systems
Title: Sony SRS-XB31 Extra Bass Waterproof Bluetooth NFC Portable Speaker with LED Ring & Strobe Lighting Red
Description: 
   Crank up the music and the lights wherever you like with Sony's SRS-XB31 wireless speaker
   packing Extra Bass tech to provide more kick to your grooves. Entirely portable thanks to Bluetooth and NFC connections and a rechargeable battery 
   it's the perfect companion to take the party with you  complete with synchronised lighting! By using the Sony Music Center App on your smart device (iOS and Android) 
   you can engage Live Sound Mode for a festival vibe  and even join in by tapping the speaker to add drum hits and sound effects. IP67 rating water 
   dust and rust resistance means worry-free transportation and the club atmosphere keeps pumping wherever you want to take it. The SRS-XB31 is the slightly larger cousin of the SRS-XB21 with additional strobes and longer battery life. Music & Lights The SRS-XB31 packs dynamic audio punch with a frequency range of 20-20 
  000 Hz for clear and powerful sound delivery. An LED multi-coloured light ring around the speaker grille and two strobe lights illuminate in unison with the beats for the ultimate portable party. So you can dance in the light with the music playing loud. Extra Bass Tailor-made for dance music and heavy grooves 
   Sony includes its Extra Bass technology. A 48mm full range speaker reaches deeper bass 
   and a rigid and light speaker cone ensures it maintains punch and clarity. Live Sound Mode & Party Booster via the Sony App Using the Sony Music Center App (available on iOS and Android) you can play DJ 
   controlling tracks and lighting  all from the convenience of your smart device. The speakers in the XB31 are specially aligned to create a three-dimensional sound experience. Engaging Live Sound Mode via the app 
   it throws your music out to a wider area and creates a live 
   festival vibe. And you can join in with the music like never before with Party Booster . Tap the speaker for additional sound effects 
   like scratch effect or drum sounds. Tap harder for louder sounds and get everyone joining in. Bluetooth & NFC It's a doddle to stream your top tracks wirelessly to the SRS-XB31 with Bluetooth and NFC connectivity. Simply pair your phone or tablet to the speaker (one touch connection with NFC) and let the music flow. LDAC technology ensures a superior listening experience to conventional Bluetooth. Battery Powered Freedom Small and compact but packing a mighty punch 
   the SRS-XB31 can go anywhere with you and lasts as long as the party does. A full charge gives you up to 24 hours of listening pleasure. Take Anywhere The XB31 is tough and durable enough to be used by the pool 
   in the park or by the beach. With an IP67 rating it can be immersed in water up to 1 metre deep for up to 30 minutes 
   is cleaned easily  and is dust-proof and rust-proof too. Wireless Party With Wireless Party Chain you can connect up to 100 compatible Sony speakers in the series via Bluetooth 
   synchronising music and lights for an extended danceathon. Or just pair two together to feel the music in super stereo. - Red

Title: Merrythought Personalised London Gold Teddy Bear with Gold Thread Gold/Red
Description: 
   The London Gold bear is hand-made from velvety soft mohair
   with contrasting felt paw pads and a beautiful satin bow at his neck. With a classic teddy bear expresion and fully jointed arms and legs 
   he will make an adorable companion for both children and adults. Personalise this gorgeous bear with a name 
   date or message in attractive gold embroidery at his paw. Merrythought is renowned for making some of the world's finest teddy bears. Handcrafted at the World Heritage Site of Ironbridge 
   in Shropshire  this fourth generation family run business is now Britain's only surviving teddy bear manufacturer. Since 1930 
   Merrythought has been delighting both adults and children with their wonderfully witty and quintessentially English designs. Each adorable bear makes a characterful companion to be treasured and cherished for life. How do I personalise? This teddy bear can be embroidered with a maximum of two lines of personalisation at his left foot pad. You can request up to 10 characters (including spaces) for each line. Once you've placed your order 
   send your details directly to sales@merrythought.co.uk   including your name 
   order number and personalised information. Alternatively  a representative will contact you by phone within 3 working days to discuss your order. Please note: if you are purchasing this as a gift and do not wish for the recipient to be contacted 
   please ensure that you put your own contact details for this order. Refund policy This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more This does not affect your statutory rights. - Gold/Red - Mohair 
 Velveteen  Satin ribbon  Cotton thread - Unisex

Category: Large Appliances/Ovens & Hobs/Range Ovens/Freestanding Ranges
Title: Rangemaster Elise 100 Induction Hob Range Cooker Cherry Red
Description: 
   The ultimate range for cooking up delicious cuisine
   the quintessential Elise is inspired by generations of gourmet excellence. Inspired by the passion and panache that ensures European chefs are revered worldwide 
   the Elise range cooker will awaken your inner gastronome with. One glance at this chic range cooker is all it takes to identify its distinctly continental design direction. From the stylish controls 
   to the coordinating brushed chrome trim that lends front profile definition 
   a continental flair for sophisticated design is evident throughout. The induction hob features 5 zones with hot hob indicators. Induction is an effortless form of heating for hob cooking. Induction heating gives near-instant heat (comparable to gas) and allows you to precisely control the temperature at which you cook. As only the area at the base of the pan is heated 
   it's also highly efficient. There's 1 multifunction oven and 1 fan oven. The main oven offers 7 different settings including defrost and base heat. There's also Rangemaster's innovative Handyrack which makes it incredibly easy to access any roasting trays. The separate grill features a glide-out action to make tending to your dish easier and more secure. The cooker is also height adjustable and has catalytic stay-clean liners. A handy storage drawer is on the bottom right hand side 
   perfect for keeping utensils or crockery warm. Please note: If you have a heart pacemaker 
   do seek advice from your doctor before using an induction hob. Please also only use pans suitable for induction hobs. These include enamelled steel 
   iron  stainless steel (depending on the alloy) and some aluminium pans with a ferromagnetic base. Glass and copper bases are unsuitable. Rangemaster's original range cooker 
   made in 1830  was a revelation to the cooking fraternity. They are still manufactured in Royal Leamington Spa 
   Warwickshire  benefiting from over 200 years of manufacturing excellence. Great cooking has always started with a great cooker and the new ranges still share the original dedication to quality 
 design and innovation. - Cherry Red 
Price: 2670.0

Category: Home & Garden/Garden & Outdoors/Garden Décor/House Numbers & Signs
Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Polished Aluminium Bridge House Sign
Description: 
    Rose Motif
   Medium Red Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. These stylish  polished aluminium house signs are a favourite of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the black background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished aluminium by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 4 weeks of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Please note: This house sign is not suitable for use in coastal areas. Made to order product This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more . This does not affect your statutory rights. - Red 
Price: 165.0

Description: 
   The ultimate range for cooking up delicious cuisine
   the quintessential Elise is inspired by generations of gourmet excellence. Inspired by the passion and panache that ensures European chefs are revered worldwide 
   the Elise range cooker will awaken your inner gastronome. One glance at this chic range cooker is all it takes to identify its distinctly continental design direction. From the stylish controls 
   to the coordinating brushed chrome trim that lends front profile definition 
   a continental flair for sophisticated design is evident throughout. The mains ignition gas hob features 6 burners including 1 at 3.5kW 
   a multi-ring wok burner and a wok cradle. Cast iron pan supports finish off the stylish appeal of this cooker. There's 1 multifunction oven and 1 fan oven. The main oven offers 7 different settings including defrost and base heat. There's also Rangemaster's innovative Handyrack which makes it incredibly easy to access any roasting trays. The separate grill features a glide-out action to make tending to your dish easier and more secure. The cooker is also height adjustable and has catalytic stay-clean liners. A handy storage drawer is on the bottom right hand side 
   perfect for keeping utensils or crockery warm. All gas appliances must be installed by a GasSafe registered engineer. Please note that connection hoses are not supplied with gas cookers for this reason. Rangemaster's original range cooker 
   made in 1830  was a revelation to the cooking fraternity. They are still manufactured in Royal Leamington Spa 
   Warwickshire  benefiting from over 200 years of manufacturing excellence. Great cooking has always started with a great cooker and the new ranges still share the original dedication to quality

Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Polished Aluminium Bridge House Sign
Description: 
    Bird Motif
   Medium Red Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. These stylish  polished aluminium house signs are a favourite of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the black background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished aluminium by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 4 weeks of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Please note: This house sign is not suitable for use in coastal areas. Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: John Lewis & Partners Michelangelo Red Wine Glass
Description: 
    Clear
   380ml  Set of 4 Pour fine wine into this chic set of four Michelangelo Red Wine Glasses from John Lewis & Partners. Made in Italy and dishwasher safe 
   this set is characterised by its clean lines and slender design and is ideal for formal and informal gatherings. A lean narrow shape is the essence of our Michelangelo glass range. Suited to any season 
   bold and beautiful designs contemporise your dinner setting. Made from Sparkx® ultra clear glass 
   which boasts transparency and strength with a high resilience to deterioration when washed regularly in a dishwasher. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. - Sparkx® ultra clear and durable glass 
Price: 25.0

   while a flow stop function ensures consistent  personalised coffee every time. The manual milk frothing arm produces rich and creamy froth for delicious cappuccinos 
   while a high performance 15 bar pressure pump ensures speedy results. In addition 
   a Thermoblock heating system means this machine is ready to use in just 40 seconds. The EC685 Dedica also dispenses hot water for fruit or herbal teas. A cup warmer keeps your mugs ready for use 
   and makes sure coffee is enjoyed at the optimal temperature. The stainless steel drip tray can accommodate anything from a tall glass to a little espresso cup 
   and as it is removable cleaning up is a breeze. An anti drip system and energy saving automatic stand by tops off this brilliant machine. - Red - Stainless steel

   to capturing the movement of each stem  every flower is hand made in England to recreate the beauty of real examples from the grounds. This acute attention to detail has gone on to earn the company accreditation from the Royal Horticultural Society.   Family run 
   Peony's team of trained florists create beautiful arrangements 
   often combining stunning glass and ceramic vessels  with life-like touches such as the brand's ‘Still Water' 
   which sets to give the effect of real water inside each vase. Real ingredients such as soil

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: LSA International Bar Collection Red Wine Glasses
Description: 
    Set of 4
  These imposing wine goblets from LSA have tall stems and large bowls 
   the perfect way to create a dramatic table setting. Handmade with perfect clarity and timeless proportions 
   and presented in a gift box  they make a wonderful present for a wedding or anniversary. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. - Soda lime glass 
Price: 40.0

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Coffee
Title:  Tea & Espresso/Tea Accessories/Tea Strainers & Filters/Tea Ball Strainers
Description: 
   T2 Ikat Tea Infuser Mug and Lid
   400ml  Red A tea infuser mug and lid for use with tea bags and loose tea leaves. Brew tea in the stainless steel infuser 
   with the lid on to keep in warmth. Simply lift out the infuser when you're ready for your drink. Made from porcelain 
   this mug features a kaleidoscopic pattern inspired by ikat patterning. Choosing the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency & delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Porcelain with stainless steel infuser 
Price: 25.0

   functional furniture.   The Eames' works have proved to be real ‘designs for life': they're iconic art pieces and objects of desire 
   yet utterly practical.   Originally made in fibreglass for the 1950 MOMA Low Cost Furniture design competition 
   the DSR was the first industrially-produced plastic chair. - Red - Polypropylene

Category: Large Appliances/Freezers & Refrigerators/Refrigerators/Standard Refrigerators
Title: Smeg FAB30RF Fridge Freezer
Description: 
    A++ Energy Rating
   60cm Wide  Right-Hand Hinge Red The Smeg FAB30RF is a classic 50's-inspired fridge freezer with modern features. It provides a smaller freezer in the top compartment 
   but gives you more refrigerator space  and is rated an excellent A++ for energy efficiency. The refrigerator compartment gives you 3 height-adjustable safety glass shelves- including a bottle shelf with bottle holder 
   1 fruit and vegetable container  1 covered storage box and a chrome wine rack. Automatic defrost is also on hand for efficient running of the fridge. The four star manual defrost freezer has an adjustable wire shelf with ice cube tray. A fast freeze function brings the temperature of the compartment down 
   so that all of your newly purchased frozen items will reach the correct temperature quickly without affecting other food items already stored. Please note: The door of this appliance has right hand side hinges. A gap of 175mm must be left on the hinged side to allow the door to open. The Smeg name is linked to its roots in the Guastallia region of Italy. Smeg stands for ‘Smalterie Metallurgiche 
   Emiliane  Guastallia' (a metal enamelling factory in Guastalla 
   Emilia  Italy). Smeg ensures exceptional build quality by using high quality components and applying rigorous testing to every appliance. It takes two years of research and testing before Smeg releases a product onto the market 
 and every appliance is tested for 15 years of use. - Red 
Price: 1299.0

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Artwork/Prints/Prints on Canvas
Title: Nicola King - Cow On Red Dark Brown Framed Print
Description: 
   Choose a fabulous artwork in a size and specification to fit your space. The high-quality image resolution is reproduced on fine art paper or canvas and creates exceptional clarity
   depth and richness of colour that really enlivens your walls. Simply select the desired framing option 
   then the size. You can go for the popular stretched canvas format 
   add a contemporary frame to the stretched canvas  or choose a classic mount and frame for your fine art paper print. Your finished piece will be made to order in the UK to museum standards and delivered within 14 working days. Handmade from solid Ash wood 
   the frame colour choices have been individually curated to complement each artwork. Each frame is finished by hand 
   with a wax coating that protects and shows off the natural grain in the wood. Framing options 
   explained: Stretched Canvas: A canvas print stretched onto a concealed wooden frame Framed Canvas: A stretched canvas print sat in a substantial wooden box frame 
   giving a contemporary art gallery feel Framed Print: A fine art paper print presented in a high-quality white mount and hand-finished wooden frame. The print is glazed with acrylic for safety All paper and canvas prints are produced using the giclée method. In line with our timber policy 
   the wood is from sustainable managed sources. All pictures come ready to hang. This is a made to order product 
   printed on museum standard quality paper  and finished in a handmade frame. We always recommend checking your wall space to ensure you're happy with your measurements. The lead time for this product is 14 days to allow time for your picture to be printed especially for you and mounted in its handmade frame. Category: Home & Garden/Garden & Outdoors/Garden Décor/House Numbers & Signs
Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Solid Brass Bridge House Sign
Description: 
    Wild Rose Motif Red
  Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. Brass signs are the pride of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished brass by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 4 weeks of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Please note: This house sign is not suitable for use in coastal areas. Made to order product This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more . This does not affect your statutory rights. - Red 
Price: 295.0

Category: Baby Products/Safety Equipment/Guards & Locks/Cabinet Locks & Straps
Title: Morris & Co. Strawberry Thief Roller Blind Red
Description: 
   This roller blind can be reverse rolled - this gives a close fit to the window helping eliminate light Can be fitted either inside or outside the window recess
   to the wall or ceiling Width can be cut to size Made using high quality components Supplied with easy fit universal brackets Includes safety devices to keep children safe   Please note: the width stated is the total width of the blind including mechanisms and brackets. Warning: young children can be strangled by loops in pull cords 
   chains  tapes and inner cords that operate the product. To avoid strangulation and entanglement 
   keep cords out of the reach of young children - cords may become wrapped around a child's neck. Move beds 
   cots and furniture away from window covering cords. Do not tie cords together. Make sure cords do not twist and create a loop.   More information on child safety can be found on the tab below and our Child Safety Hub . - Red - 100% polyester - W61 x Drop 160cm

   it'll effortlessly satisfy all your printing needs in fine style. Premium Printing & Pictures Print at a resolution of up to 4800 dpi and enjoy premium quality colour photos and images as well as clear 
   superbly defined text documents. With speeds of 15 ipm for black and white printing and 10 ipm for colour 
   you can get your hands on a lab quality borderless 10x15cm (4x6) photo in just 17 seconds. You can also print directly onto media discs. Space Saving The TS8152 has been designed with an economical footprint and space-saving design in mind. With elegant contoured styling 
   it'll fit neatly and practically into your home or office. Dual feeder design means you can load photo paper (in the rear) and plain paper (in the front cassette) at the same time.    you'll always be able to find the most convenient way to run off your documents (Bluetooth print and scan is only available on Android devices). PIXMA Cloud Link allows you to print from popular social networking sites and other cloud services. Or 
   of course  print straight from USB cable or even memory card using the built-in SD slot. Touch Screen Control The TS8152 features a large 10.8cm highly-responsive colour LCD touch screen on the front panel which automatically tilts for ease of use. Individual Inks It uses 6 single inks so you only need to replace the colour that runs out 
   making printing more efficient. You can also purchase optional XL and XXL ink cartridges to print more pages and save you replacing them so often if you print a lot

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: Riedel Veritas New World Pinot Noir Red Wine Glass
Description: 
    Clear
   690ml Enjoy your favourite wine the way it was meant to taste with this wonderful lead crystal creation from Riedel. Veritas glasses are 15% taller than Riedel's Vinum collection 
   but 25% lighter  while still remaining dishwasher safe  break-resistant and suitable for everyday use. Designed by Claus Riedel 
   this innovative collection of glassware is manufactured from the finest crystal in Austria and Germany and shaped according to the character of the wine in order to enhance its rich 
   aromatic flavours. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. - Lead crystal glass 
Price: 27.5

Category: Baby Products/Car Seats & Accessories/Car Seats
Title: Maxi-Cosi - Airprotect-Group 2-3 - Car Seat - Robin Red
Description: 
   The Maxi-Cosi Rodi AirProtect is suitable for children from 15 to 36 kg (approx 3.5 to 12 years) and features revolutionary side impact protection thanks to its AirProtect system in built in the headrest. It reduces the force during a side collision by releasing air at the precise moment of impact

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Dishware & Serving Pieces/Cups
Title:  Mugs & Saucers
Description: 
   London Pottery Spot Mug
   270ml  Red Easy to spot when it's time for a tea or coffee break 
   this polka dot mug from London Pottery brings colour to a kitchen or dining room. Made of stoneware 
   it's hard-wearing and suitable for use in the dishwasher and microwave. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency & delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Stoneware 
Price: 9.0

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Furniture
Title: Vitra Eames DSR Side Chair
Description: 
    Chrome Leg Red
  These chairs are limited edition in line with the September Vitra event at Peter Jones. The iconic Vitra Eames DSR is ultra-stylish and beautifully comfortable in design 
   made from a moulded seat that's designed for every 'body'  atop a gleaming architectural chrome base. Every colour in the selection complements each other 
   so you can mix and match to suit your décor. With their new seat height 
   the Eames Plastic Chairs are even better suited for use in combination with contemporary dining tables. At home as well as in restaurants and cafeterias 
   the many configuration options make it possible to find just the right chair for any furnishing scheme or interior environment. Husband and wife team Charles and Ray Eames revolutionised 20th Century furniture design. They combined their respective disciplines in architecture and modern art with low-cost yet durable materials to create perfectly balanced 
   functional furniture. The Eames' works have proved to be real ‘designs for life': they're iconic art pieces and objects of desire 
   yet utterly practical. Originally made in fibreglass for the 1950 MOMA Low Cost Furniture design competition 
   the DSR was the first industrially-produced plastic chair. - Red - Polypropylene 
 metal 
Price: 350.0

This will automatically take six of the same picture and apply a range of effects and filters to five of them so that you can see the different results. Category: Baby Products/Car Seats & Accessories/Car Seats
Title: Britax Römer KIDFIX XP SICT Group 2/3 Car Seat
Description: 
    Flame Red
  The Kidfix XP Sict car seat from Britax has XP-PAD technology to hold the child close while the new adjustable Sict (Side Impact Cushion Technology) protects against side impacts. This is now adjustable so it is only used on the side closest to the door 
   freeing up space for additional passengers.   Forward-facing 
   this car seat is suitable from 15kg to 36kg  or approximately 4-12 years. In the event of a frontal impact it takes up to 30% of the energy forces away from your child's neck vs the adult seat belt alone. This sets a new safety standard for Group 2-3.   The intuitively positioned seat belt guides ensure a repeated correct positioning of the adult 3-point seat belt to maximise protection for your child. The deep 
   softly padded full side wings provide optimum Side Impact Protection for your child along the entire seat.   The V-shaped backrest ensures a perfect fit throughout your child's development and the height-adjustable headrest and belt guide allow the seat to grow with your child whilst keeping the adult seat belt in the correct position over your child's shoulder.   The Isofit system makes installation as safe and secure as it is simple. It ensures that the seat is secured 
   even when not in use  meaning there is no need to remove or install the seat with belt when your child is not using it. The installation indicators also confirm the seat is installed correctly.   Conveniently 
   the retracting Isofix arms allow the Isofix connectors to be stowed during storage or when used in the belted-only option. The softly padded cover not only keeps your child comfortable in their seat but can be easily removed for washing.   All our car seats and infant carriers comply with current European regulation ECE R44.04.   Safety: Under no circumstances should a car seat be used on a passenger seat where there is an airbag. Correct fitting of all car seats and boosters is of paramount importance to make them most effective in the event of an accident. Not all car seats fit all cars and it is important to check for fitting suitability on all cars you intend fitting the seat to 
   as well as re-checking if you change your car. Always read the instruction booklet which comes with your car seat to achieve a safe and correct fitting 
   retaining the guide for future reference. We recommend fitting your car seat in advance of first using it. We recommend that babies shouldn`t be left in Group 0/0+ car seats (infant carriers) for prolonged periods.   Suitability: Please make sure that you check the car seat you choose is suitable for your car before ordering. Some of our shops offer a car seat fit test 
   where a Nursery advisor will test the display model in your car to check that it will fit properly. Please contact your local shop to see if this service is available. Alternatively 
   please contact the car seat manufacturer who will be able to advise whether their model will be suitable for your car. Find your nearest department store   Car seats are categorised into the following groups and it is imperative that a category is chosen so the child`s weight falls within the range indicated: Car Seat groups: Group Child's weight approx. age of child 0 birth up to 10kg/22lb birth up to 6-9 months 0+ birth up to 13kg/29lb birth up to 12-15 months 0+ & 1 birth up to 18kg/40lb birth to up to about 4 years 1 9-18kg/20-40lb about 9 months to 4 years 1 & 2 9-25kg/20-55lb about 9 months to 6 years 2 15-25kg/33-55lb about 4 to 6 years 1 
   2  3 9-36kg/20-79lb about 9 months to 12 years 2 & 3 15-36kg/33-79lb about 4-12 years Note: some car seats will be approved in two or more groups. 0% APR Representative: this product is eligible for Interest Free Credit

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: LSA International Bar Collection Red Wine Glasses
Description: 
    Set of 4
  These red wine glasses are expertly hand-crafted by LSA in Poland. Designed with long 
   luxurious stems and a generous round bowl  they complement the rich and aromatic flavours of your favourite wine.  Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. 
Price: 50.0

Title: Molly Hatch Flower Butter Dish
Description: 
    Red/Multi
   L17cm A bright and cheery floral pattern adorns this butter dish from Molly Hatch. Made from stoneware 
   it's conveniently dishwasher safe. It's part of a tableware collection that's exclusive to John Lewis. Developed by ceramic artist Molly Hatch 
   this collection features hand-painted designs  making each piece truly unique. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency and delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Stoneware 
Price: 20.0

Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency and delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Stoneware 
Price: 16.0

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Dishware & Serving Pieces/Cups
Title:  Mugs & Saucers
Description: 
   Sunny Todd Prints Stackable Floral Mug
   425ml Pink/Red Colourful and contemporary  this stackable mug from Sunny Todd Prints is sure to brighten up a coffee or dining table. Made of porcelain 
   it's adorned with a chic floral pattern in upbeat colours. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency and delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Pink/Red - Porcelain 
Price: 5.0

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Artwork/Prints/Prints on Canvas
Title: Nicola King - Cow On Red Natural Ash Framed Canvas
Description: 
   Choose a fabulous artwork in a size and specification to fit your space. The high-quality image resolution is reproduced on fine art paper or canvas and creates exceptional clarity
   depth and richness of colour that really enlivens your walls. Simply select the desired framing option 
   then the size. You can go for the popular stretched canvas format 
   add a contemporary frame to the stretched canvas  or choose a classic mount and frame for your fine art paper print. Your finished piece will be made to order in the UK to museum standards and delivered within 14 working days. Handmade from solid Ash wood 
   the frame colour choices have been individually curated to complement each artwork. Each frame is finished by hand 
   with a wax coating that protects and shows off the natural grain in the wood. Framing options 
   explained: Stretched Canvas: A canvas print stretched onto a concealed wooden frame Framed Canvas: A stretched canvas print sat in a substantial wooden box frame 
   giving a contemporary art gallery feel Framed Print: A fine art paper print presented in a high-quality white mount and hand-finished wooden frame. The print is glazed with acrylic for safety All paper and canvas prints are produced using the giclée method. In line with our timber policy 
   the wood is from sustainable managed sources. All pictures come ready to hang. This is a made to order product 
   printed on museum standard quality paper  and finished in a handmade frame. We always recommend checking your wall space to ensure you're happy with your measurements. The lead time for this product is 14 days to allow time for your picture to be printed especially for you and mounted in its handmade frame.    printed on museum standard quality paper  and finished in a handmade frame. We always recommend checking your wall space to ensure you're happy with your measurements. Title: T & G Capstan Pepper Mill
Description: 
    40.5cm Red
  This classic Capstan Pepper Mill from T & G is perfect for cooks adding seasoning or ready for guests as a dining table piece. Standing tall at 40.5cm (16”) 
   it's made from hevea wood and designed with an elegant shape. It's an easy grind with fully adjustable mechanisms that are ceramic. Unlike metal 
   they won't corrode and unlike plastic  they won't wear out. That's why this pepper mill comes with a Lifetime Mechanism Guarantee. Choose your mills Freshly ground salt and pepper delivers a more intense and true flavour and enhances the taste of food. A fine grind gives an even flavour and is perfect for sauces 
   while a coarse grind is ideal for marinades or steaks. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your salt or pepper mill. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Manual crush grinders A good 
   simple choice for everyday seasoning. Battery operated grinders All the benefits of freshly ground without the effort. Precision grinders These give a better fragrance and release a real burst of flavour. They also enable you to select the coarseness of grind. - Red - Wood

   60cm Wide  Right-Hand Hinge Red The Smeg FAB30RF is a classic 50's-inspired fridge freezer with modern features. It provides a smaller freezer in the top compartment 
   but gives you more refrigerator space  and is rated an excellent A++ for energy efficiency. The refrigerator compartment gives you 3 height-adjustable safety glass shelves- including a bottle shelf with bottle holder

   so that all of your newly purchased frozen items will reach the correct temperature quickly without affecting other food items already stored. Please note: The door of this appliance has right hand side hinges. A gap of 175mm must be left on the hinged side to allow the door to open. The Smeg name is linked to its roots in the Guastallia region of Italy. Smeg stands for ‘Smalterie Metallurgiche 
   Emiliane  Guastallia' (a metal enamelling factory in Guastalla

Category: Home & Garden/Home & Kitchen/Cooking & Dining/Tableware/Glassware/Wine Glasses
Title: LSA International Wine Collection Stemless Red Wine Glasses
Description: 
    Set of 4
  Enjoy your wine continental-style with these great stemless wine glasses - perfect for everyday use. The LSA Wine collection is made from mouth blown glass and sculpted with clean 
   contemporary lines. Each LSA Bar piece comes in a presentation box and would make an ideal gift. The range is designed to work in combination with pieces from other LSA collections such as Bar and Serve. Choose the perfect glassware Glass comes in a range of weights 
   cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from 
   designed to suit every budget and occasion. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color:#dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Soda lime Versatile and available in many colours and styles 
   soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand 
   soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items. Crystal Glass Finer in quality with greater clarity than soda glass 
   crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges. Lead crystal With a beautiful clarity 
   weight and resonance  lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead' 
   the glass has at least 24% Lead Oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed 
   only. Sparkx® Neither Soda Lime Glass or Crystal Glass  but is Ultra Clear Glass is pure 
   transparent and heavy metal free. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers. SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass 
   meaning it has all the same ingredients at Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that makes it even stronger with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even sparkx®. LUXION® 100% Lead free Crystal glass which replaces its former 24% Lead Crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency & exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable. Recycled Glassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass. Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime glass. Handmade This type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above 
   depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion. Decorative There are many ways to decorate glass including; cutting 
   spraying  diamond etching  pantograph etching  silk screen printing 
   sand blasting  hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material. - Glass 
Price: 32.95

   this two-tiered pot separates into a matching cup and saucer. Wedgwood's Paeonia Blush collection celebrates the peony flower with an eclectic mix of gifts and teaware. Derived from the botanical name for the peony 
   the Paeonia collection is designed in the chinoiserie style 
   popularised by the eighteenth and nineteenth-century obsession with the Orient. A historic flower dating back thousands of years 
   the peony is known as the flower of riches and honour. With its luscious and rounded blooms 
   peonies have come to represent romance and prosperity  and are widely regarded as an omen of good fortune and happy marriage. Choose the perfect china All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims 
   everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china. table.cq-sizeguidetable {width:100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align:left; font-family: Arial; font-size:12px; border-bottom:1px solid #f4f2ec; margin-top:10px;padding-bottom:1px;}table.cq-sizeguidetable th {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;background-color: #dedbd2;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td {border-width: 0px;padding: 8px;border-style: none;}table.cq-sizeguidetable td:first-child {font-weight:bold;}.cq-sizeguidetable tr:nth-child(odd){background-color: #f4f2ec;} Earthenware Strong and practical 
   perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces. Stoneware Tougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C. Terracotta Uses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour 
   and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters. Porcelain Delicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table. Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength 
   translucency & delicacy. Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave 
   dishwasher* and oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use 
   not just formal. * Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions - Fine bone china 
Price: 130.0

Category: Home & Garden/Garden & Outdoors/Garden Décor/House Numbers & Signs
Title: The House Nameplate Company Personalised Polished Aluminium Bridge House Sign
Description: 
    Rose Motif
   Small Red Designed and handcrafted in North Wales  the House Nameplate Company create beautiful signs and gifts 
   adding personality and style to your home. These stylish  polished aluminium house signs are a favourite of the collection 
   with each stage meticulously carried out during a 4 week manufacturing process and quality controlled to ensure your sign arrives to you in perfect condition. How do I personalise my product? Add wording of your choice. Your house name will be hand applied in your choice of upper case letters. The whole sign is left to dry for 48 hours before a base primer coat is applied. After a further 48 hours the black background colour is applied to the sign and the rim and letters are cleaned back to the polished aluminium by hand. The sign is then dried fully for 7-10 days before it is buffed to a shine by talented craftsmen and women. Screw fixings are included. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 4 weeks of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Please note: This house sign is not suitable for use in coastal areas. A representative will contact you by phone within 24 hours of placing your order (the next working day if your order is placed at the weekend). Your sign will be completed and delivered within 7 days of ordering. Alternatively you can contact the House Nameplate Company straightaway by emailing johnlewis@hnpuk.com Made to order product This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more . This does not affect your statutory rights. - Red / White 
Price: 25.0
